item.title: Setup Python on Windows
item.description: Motivation # Instructions on this page should be followed in order to produce the desired effects, namely: Visual Studio Code (VSCode) must be installed before Git Bash, so that VSCode may be specified as the default editor for Git. Git Bash must be installed before Anaconda Navigator, so that Anaconda Navigator may detect Git Bash on the system path. VSCode must be installed before Anaconda Navigator, so that VSCode may be launched from Anaconda Navigator.
